	\begin{tasks}(2)
		\task $\{z \in \CC, \mid z-1 \mid = \mid z - i\mid\}$
		\task $\{z \in \CC, \mid z \mid = \mid \frac{1}{z}\mid = \mid 1 -z \mid\}$
